sentences.en: A thin, glistening thread of moisture ran along the rough concrete sill.
sentences.cn: 在粗糙不平的水泥窗台上有一条细细的发光水印。

sentences.en: Better fastening between sill and wall footing would be beneficial.
sentences.cn: 改善地基与墙基之间的连结是有益处的.

sentences.en: Charlotte moved along the sill, then cocked her leg over the edge of the roof.
sentences.cn: 夏洛蒂沿着窗台挪动着, 然后翘起一条腿放到屋顶的边缘上.

sentences.en: Chunks of the overlying rock may break off and become a part of a sill.
sentences.cn: 上复岩石的碎块可能破裂并成为岩床的一部分.

sentences.en: Hadley glances at the rocks lining the window sill, turns to Norton.
sentences.cn: 哈雷看看窗台上排着的石头, 转向诺顿.

sentences.en: He fell from the window sill and put his shoulder out.
sentences.cn: 他从窗台下摔了下来,跌得肩膀脱了臼.

sentences.en: Ming - feng rapped softly against the window -- sill .
sentences.cn: 她又走去在 窗板 上敲了两下,她盼望他会听见敲声.

sentences.en: She neatly aligned the flower pots on the window sill.
sentences.cn: 她把花盆整齐地排成一行在窗台上.

sentences.en: She sat with one elbow resting on the sill of the open window.
sentences.cn: 她坐在那儿,一只胳膊肘搁在开着窗的窗台上.

sentences.en: She soon withdrew them, however, and retreated a few feet to rest against the window - sill.
sentences.cn: 不过她不久就把自己的手抽了回去, 往后退了几步,倚在窗台上.

sentences.en: The cat sat on the sill and looked out of the window.
sentences.cn: 猫坐在窗台上,从窗户往外看.

sentences.en: The Royal Airforce sill remained dangerously short of bombers.
sentences.cn: 英国皇家空军仍未脱离极为缺乏轰炸机的危境.

sentences.en: Whitlock was perched on the sill of the room's only window.
sentences.cn: 惠特洛克坐在房间里仅有的那扇窗户的边沿上。

sentences.en: Winston sat back against the window - sill.
Words failed him and he sat quite sill.
sentences.cn: 他找不出话来骂,坐着一动不动.

words.tran_cn: [建]窗台；基石；门槛；[海洋]海底山脊

trans.tran_cn: 窗台（板），门槛，[地]岩床，海底山脊，平巷底
trans.tran_en: the narrow shelf at the base of a window frame
